verses.verse: וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said וְהֵן֙ <WH2005> if לֹֽא־ <WH3808> they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> But behold they will not believe לִ֔י וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> me nor hearken בְּקֹלִ֑י <WH6963> unto my voice כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <WH559> for they will say לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> hath not appeared אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> The LORD
וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD [מַזֶּה כ] (מַה־ זֶּ֣ה <WH2088> he ק) בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> able וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said מַטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> A rod

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said הַשְׁלִיכֵ֣הוּ <WH7993> Cast אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> it on the ground וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <WH7993> And he cast אַ֖רְצָה <WH776> it on the ground וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> became לְנָחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> and it became a serpent וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> fled מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> and Moses מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> from before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses שְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> Put forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand וֶאֱחֹ֖ז <WH270> and take בִּזְנָב֑וֹ <WH2180> it by the tail וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> And he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> his hand וַיַּ֣חֲזֶק <WH2388> and caught בּ֔וֹ וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became לְמַטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> it and it became a rod בְּכַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH3709> in his hand

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because of יַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> That they may believe כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> hath appeared אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> and the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD ל֜וֹ ע֗וֹד <WH5750> furthermore הָֽבֵא־ <WH935> unto him Put נָ֤א <WH4994> Now יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> now thine hand בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> into thy bosom וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> And he put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <WH2436> into his bosom וַיּ֣וֹצִאָ֔הּ <WH3318> and when he took וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> it out behold his hand מְצֹרַ֥עַת <WH6879> [was] leprous כַּשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <WH7950> as snow

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said הָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> again יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> thine hand אֶל־ <WH413> into חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> into thy bosom וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> again יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand אֶל־ <WH413> into חֵיק֑וֹ <WH2436> into his bosom וַיּֽוֹצִאָהּ֙ <WH3318> and plucked מֵֽחֵיק֔וֹ <WH2436> it out of his bosom וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold שָׁ֖בָה <WH7725> and behold it was turned again כִּבְשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <WH1320> as his [other] flesh

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <WH539> And it shall come to pass if they will not believe לָ֔ךְ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> thee neither hearken לְקֹ֖ל <WH6963> to the voice הָאֹ֣ת <WH226> sign הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> of the first וְהֶֽאֱמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> that they will believe לְקֹ֖ל <WH6963> the voice הָאֹ֥ת <WH226> sign הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> of the latter

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> will become אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יַאֲמִ֡ינוּ <WH539> And it shall come to pass if they will not believe גַּם֩ <WH1571> even לִשְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> also these two הָאֹת֜וֹת <WH226> signs הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> or יִשְׁמְעוּן֙ <WH8085> neither hearken לְקֹלֶ֔ךָ <WH6963> unto thy voice וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> that thou shalt take מִמֵּימֵ֣י <WH4325> of the water הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> of the river וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֖ <WH8210> and pour הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <WH3004> [it] upon the dry וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> will become הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> [land] and the water אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> which thou takest מִן־ <WH4480> some הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> out of the river וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> will become לְדָ֖ם <WH1818> shall become blood בַּיַּבָּֽשֶׁת׃ <WH3006> upon the dry

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> unto the LORD בִּ֣י <WH994> O אֲדֹנָי֒ <WH136> my Lord לֹא֩ <WH3808> have never אִ֨ישׁ <WH582> not דְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> [am] not eloquent אָנֹ֗כִי <WH595> I גַּ֤ם <WH1571> neither מִתְּמוֹל֙ <WH8543> before גַּ֣ם <WH1571> nor מִשִּׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <WH8032> time גַּ֛ם <WH1571> nor מֵאָ֥ז <WH227> nor since דַּבֶּרְךָ <WH1696> thou hast spoken אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> unto thy servant כִּ֧י <WH3588> for כְבַד־ <WH3515> but I [am] slow פֶּ֛ה <WH6310> of speech וּכְבַ֥ד <WH3515> and of a slow לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> tongue אָנֹֽכִי׃ <WH595> I

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him מִ֣י <WH4310> Who שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> unto him Who hath made פֶּה֮ <WH6310> according לָֽאָדָם֒ <WH120> man's א֚וֹ <WH176> or מִֽי־ <WH4310> who יָשׂ֣וּם <WH7760> makes אִלֵּ֔ם <WH483> the dumb א֣וֹ <WH176> or חֵרֵ֔שׁ <WH2795> or deaf א֥וֹ <WH176> or פִקֵּ֖חַ <WH6493> or the seeing א֣וֹ <WH176> or עִוֵּ֑ר <WH5787> blind men הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now לֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> go וְאָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> will be with פִּ֔יךָ <WH6310> and I will be with thy mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֖יךָ <WH3384> and teach אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> thee what thou shalt say

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said בִּ֣י <WH994> O אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> my Lord שְֽׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> send נָ֖א <WH4994> now בְּיַד־ <WH3027> I pray thee by the hand תִּשְׁלָֽח׃ <WH7971> [of him whom] thou wilt send

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֨ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> against Moses וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and he said הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> [Is] not Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> your brother הַלֵּוִ֔י <WH3881> the Levite יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> acknowledge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for דַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that he can speak יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> well ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> and moreover הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold הוּא֙ <WH1931> he יֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> And also behold he cometh forth לִקְרָאתֶ֔ךָ <WH7125> to meet וְרָאֲךָ֖ <WH7200> thee and when he seeth וְשָׂמַ֥ח <WH8056> glad בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> in his heart

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> unto him and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> words בְּפִ֑יו <WH6310> in his mouth וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I אֶֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> will be with פִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6310> and I will be with thy mouth וְעִם־ <WH5973> with פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> and with his mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֣י <WH3384> and will teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <WH6213> you what ye shall do

וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> And he shall be thy spokesman ה֥וּא <WH1931> he לְךָ֖ אֶל־ <WH413> for הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto the people וְהָ֤יָה <WH1961> become הוּא֙ <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לְּךָ֣ לְפֶ֔ה <WH6310> and he shall be [even] he shall be to thee instead of a mouth וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לּ֥וֹ לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> and thou shalt be to him instead of God

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּטֶּ֥ה <WH4294> this rod הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this תִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> And thou shalt take בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> in thine hand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> wherewith thou shalt do בּ֖וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹתֹֽת׃ <WH226> signs פ

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> departed מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיָּ֣שָׁב ׀ <WH7725> and returned אֶל־ <WH413> and יֶ֣תֶר <WH3503> And Jethro חֹֽתְנ֗וֹ <WH2859> his father in law וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said לוֹ֙ אֵ֣לְכָה <WH1980> go נָּ֗א <WH4994> Please וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <WH7725> I pray thee and return אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֣י <WH251> unto my brethren אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> which [are] in Egypt וְאֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> and see הַעוֹדָ֣ם <WH5750> whether they be yet חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> alive וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יִתְר֛וֹ <WH3503> and Jethro לְמֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> to Moses לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> Go לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> unto Moses בְּמִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> in Midian לֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> Go שֻׁ֣ב <WH7725> return מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֙תוּ֙ <WH4191> are dead כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> for all the men הַֽמְבַקְשִׁ֖ים <WH1245> which sought אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> thy life

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <WH802> his wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֗יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיַּרְכִּבֵם֙ <WH7392> and set עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַחֲמֹ֔ר <WH2543> them upon an ass וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> and he returned אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> to the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> the rod הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> unto Moses בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֙ <WH1980> go לָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> to return מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt רְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> see כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמֹּֽפְתִים֙ <WH4159> all those wonders אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> which I have put בְיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> in thine hand וַעֲשִׂיתָ֖ם <WH6213> that thou do לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֲחַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> but I will harden אֶת־ <WH853> לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> his heart וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יְשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> that he shall not let the people

וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <WH559> And thou shalt say אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּנִ֥י <WH1121> [is] my son בְכֹרִ֖י <WH1060> [even] my firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And I say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to you שַׁלַּ֤ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִי֙ <WH1121> unto thee Let my son וְיַֽעַבְדֵ֔נִי <WH5647> that he may serve וַתְּמָאֵ֖ן <WH3985> me and if thou refuse לְשַׁלְּח֑וֹ <WH7971> to let him go הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I הֹרֵ֔ג <WH2026> behold I will slay אֶת־ <WH853> בִּנְךָ֖ <WH1121> thy son בְּכֹרֶֽךָ׃ <WH1060> [even] thy firstborn

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came בַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> And it came to pass by the way בַּמָּל֑וֹן <WH4411> in the inn וַיִּפְגְּשֵׁ֣הוּ <WH6298> met יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that the LORD וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> him and sought הֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4191> to kill

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took צִפֹּרָ֜ה <WH6855> Then Zipporah צֹ֗ר <WH6864> a sharp stone וַתִּכְרֹת֙ <WH3772> and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְלַ֣ת <WH6190> the foreskin בְּנָ֔הּ <WH1121> of her son וַתַּגַּ֖ע <WH5060> and cast לְרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> [it] at his feet וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said כִּ֧י <WH3588> are indeed חֲתַן־ <WH2860> husband דָּמִ֛ים <WH1818> Surely a bloody אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לִֽי׃
